contentrichtext.text: '''Croft''' may refer to: {{Wiktionarypar|croft}} * [[Croft (land)]], an area of land with a crofter's dwelling, used for [[crofting]] (small-scale food production). * [[Bleachfield]], an open space used for the bleaching of fabric, sometimes called crofts. Locations in the United Kingdom: *[[Croft, Cheshire]], in the Borough of Warrington *[[Croft, Leicestershire]] *[[Croft, Lincolnshire]] *[[Croft, Pembrokeshire]] *[[Croft, Herefordshire]] *[[Croft Castle]], Herefordshire *[[Croft-on-Tees]], North Yorkshire *[[Crofton town]], originally called "Croft-town'', the town standing upon the Crofts Locations in the United States: *[[Croft, California]] For people named Croft, see [[Croft (surname)]]. Other uses: *[[Croft Circuit]], a motor racing circuit in northeast England located Darlington ==See also== *[[Crofts End, Bristol]] *[[Crofton, Cumbria]] *[[Crofton, British Columbia]] *[[Ashcroft (disambiguation)]] *[[Undercroft]] {{disambig}} [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]]
